name: Sarcomatoid Features
title: Sarcomatoid Features
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of Sarcomatoid Features can be used to code this data item.

**Note 2:** Sarcomatoid morphology may be manifested by any renal cell carcinoma. The presence of sarcomatoid component in a renal cell carcinoma may be prognostically important. 

**Note 3:** Record the presence or absence of sarcomatoid features as documented anywhere in the pathology report. 

**Note 4:** Do not use imaging findings to code this data item. 

**Note 5:** Code XX9 if surgical resection of the primary site is performed and there is no mention of sarcomatoid features.
rows: Sarcomatoid features stated as less than 10%
Sarcomatoid features stated as range 10%-30% present
Sarcomatoid features stated as a range 31% to 50% present
Sarcomatoid features stated as a range 51% to 80% present
Sarcomatoid features stated as greater than 80%
Not applicable: Not a renal cell carcinoma morphology

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code XX8 may result in an edit error.)

Not documented in medical record
Sarcomatoid features not assessed or unknown if assessed
No surgical resection of primary site is performed
